name: The Odd Man Out
description:
It's strange I know, but it does incorporate the number three and that's what matters.

In a world where only one man stands between dust bunnies, terrible allergies and a dirty basement, it's up to you. Take your Scotch Pads and show that dust who's boss! You can stir up the dust with the Scotch pads, careful you can only use three at a time.

Something exciting happens every time you get three kills.

WASD or arrow keys for movement, up to jump, space to shoot, down + space throws a pad down and gives you a bit of a boost.

Reload the page to start the game again.

All of the assets are original with the exception of the Quick Engine library.
